resources.string: USE THE SEARCH BAR TO FIND A BACKGROUND FOR YOUR PICTURE
Please begin by entering a search term in to the Search Bar on page 1. You will then be asked to choose a background that you enjoy most!
After choosing a background, you will be brought to a new activity where you can take an image that can be cropped into the background you chose previously!
Once you are finished cropping your image and are satisfied with how it turned out, feel free to share the image with friends, or start all over with a new background!
